title: Relations (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 21 of 2019) hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Relations (Amendment) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Industrial Relations (Amendment) Act 

2019 (Commencement) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited industrial relation (amendment) act 2019 (commencement) order 2020

title: Relations (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 21 of 2019) hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The 1st day of February 2020 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of February 2020 is appointed as the day on which the 
Industrial Relations (Amendment) Act 2019 (No. 21 of 2019) comes into 
operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

29 January, 2020. 

HEATHER HUMPHREYS, 

Minister for Business, Enterprise and Innovation. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st January, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [24] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
